mapper.sql: select id id, property_name propertyName, property_value propertyValue, dept_id deptId, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified, is_deleted isDeleted, user_id_create userIdCreate, user_id_modified userIdModified from dept_expand
mapper.update: update dept_expand set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
